a.title: Niles Township District for Special Education

li.a: Niles Township District for Special Education

span.br: Fairview School District 72 will be closed school will remain closed through the end of the 2019-2020 school year, June 9, 2020.

a.title: covid
a.span: Please visit this page for the most up-to-date information and to access E-Learning Plans.

p.span:
Our Mission Statement
Create a strong foundation for academic excellence and personal growth by setting high expectations, teaching to the needs of learners, and embracing the richness of our cultural diversity

ul.li: Both success and failure create opportunities for growth
Our multicultural district is a valued asset that enriches the entire school community
Student achievement soars when instructional strategies are engaging and reflect the needs of our learners
A safe physical and emotional school environment advanceslearning and promotes respect for all
The most effective decisions are made collaboratively with children as the focus
